title: Abiky
author: Abiky
content: Does anyone have a sealed box of the Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 release? I want to buy one with BTC. There are a few on sale at eBay, but I think they are overpriced (please correct me if I'm wrong).Shipping to the US. Please reach out to me via PM if you're willing to do business. I will take the best deal/offer. Thanks for looking.

comments.author: Mrstacy
comments.body: Quote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:15:24 PMDoes anyone have a sealed box of the Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 release? I want to buy one with BTC. There are a few on sale at eBay, but I think they are overpriced (please correct me if I'm wrong).Shipping to the US. Please reach out to me via PM if you're willing to do business. I will take the best deal/offer. Thanks for looking. These come in at least 3 flavors.  A 2-pack box, a 12-box inner case and a 48-box case

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: Mrstacy on September 02, 2023, 04:24:26 PMQuote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:15:24 PMDoes anyone have a sealed box of the Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 release? I want to buy one with BTC. There are a few on sale at eBay, but I think they are overpriced (please correct me if I'm wrong).Shipping to the US. Please reach out to me via PM if you're willing to do business. I will take the best deal/offer. Thanks for looking. These come in at least 3 flavors.  A 2-pack box, a 12-box inner case and a 48-box caseA 2-pack box is what I'm looking for. Thanks for clarifying, by the way.

comments.author: SurfinPanda
comments.body: There’s some 2 pack boxes for $40 on eBay. Original price was $32 but I think you’re going to pay a premium now for them since they are sold out.

comments.author: Mrstacy
comments.body: Quote from: SurfinPanda on September 02, 2023, 04:41:26 PMThere’s some 2 pack boxes for $40 on eBay. Original price was $32 but I think you’re going to pay a premium now for them since they are sold out.Agree with this. When series 2 is released,  folks will want a series 1.  That markup may seem small in months to come

comments.author: Abiky
comments.created_time: September 02, 2023, 05:28:23 PMLast edit: September 02, 2023, 06:12:18 PM by Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: SurfinPanda on September 02, 2023, 04:41:26 PMThere’s some 2 pack boxes for $40 on eBay. Original price was $32 but I think you’re going to pay a premium now for them since they are sold out.Most likely. But I didn't expect them to rise so quickly. Are the ones being sold on Gamestop still in stock (although they don't accept BTC)? Otherwise, I'll try my luck with eBay.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:25:59 PMQuote from: Mrstacy on September 02, 2023, 04:24:26 PMQuote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:15:24 PMDoes anyone have a sealed box of the Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 release? I want to buy one with BTC. There are a few on sale at eBay, but I think they are overpriced (please correct me if I'm wrong).Shipping to the US. Please reach out to me via PM if you're willing to do business. I will take the best deal/offer. Thanks for looking. These come in at least 3 flavors.  A 2-pack box, a 12-box inner case and a 48-box caseA 2-pack box is what I'm looking for. Thanks for clarifying, by the way. I would absolutely NEVER buy a 2 pack box secondhand. These cards were ridiculously easy to pack search. Simple scale and you will know if you have any hits in the box. Not perfect but really really really close to it. My .02 satoshis

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: PreciousMetapsICT on September 02, 2023, 06:52:09 PMQuote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:25:59 PMQuote from: Mrstacy on September 02, 2023, 04:24:26 PMQuote from: Abiky on September 02, 2023, 04:15:24 PMDoes anyone have a sealed box of the Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 release? I want to buy one with BTC. There are a few on sale at eBay, but I think they are overpriced (please correct me if I'm wrong).Shipping to the US. Please reach out to me via PM if you're willing to do business. I will take the best deal/offer. Thanks for looking. These come in at least 3 flavors.  A 2-pack box, a 12-box inner case and a 48-box caseA 2-pack box is what I'm looking for. Thanks for clarifying, by the way. I would absolutely NEVER buy a 2 pack box secondhand. These cards were ridiculously easy to pack search. Simple scale and you will know if you have any hits in the box. Not perfect but really really really close to it. My .02 satoshisYeah, I know. But I wouldn't mind as long as the box is wrapped in its original plastic (sealed). I'd buy a sealed 2-pack box, and treasure it forever.That said, I'm willing to buy one for $40 if someone's interested (assuming that's the lowest price they're going for). I have BTC ready for payment (want to save money on eBay fees and whatnot).

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: If you can find a box for $40 snatch it up and dont look back. I just paid $50 at dave and adams card shop.

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on September 03, 2023, 03:13:37 PMIf you can find a box for $40 snatch it up and dont look back. I just paid $50 at dave and adams card shop. Wow. Whatever's left of the series 1 release, is being sold out at a higher price. Imagine 5-10 years from now. Sealed collector and 2-pack boxes would be worth 3x their original price. I'm not going to miss this opportunity again with series 2. I will treasure a sealed 2-pack box forever (never going to open it). Wish me luck!

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: Abiky on September 03, 2023, 11:34:20 PMQuote from: Cryptogreatdane on September 03, 2023, 03:13:37 PMIf you can find a box for $40 snatch it up and dont look back. I just paid $50 at dave and adams card shop. Wow. Whatever's left of the series 1 release, is being sold out at a higher price. Imagine 5-10 years from now. Sealed collector and 2-pack boxes would be worth 3x their original price. I'm not going to miss this opportunity again with series 2. I will treasure a sealed 2-pack box forever (never going to open it). Wish me luck!  In 5-10 Years probably $1000 a box. boxes will be going for 3X by Christmas.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Why is it the other Bitcoin cards https://btc-tc.com/ bringing like $8k for a series 1 sealed box and these not going to be the same.   This tread made me go on eBay and buy a sealed 12 back box.  I had to get in on the action. The collectable forum always cost me sats whenever I go on it to read up.  Lol

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on September 04, 2023, 03:23:44 AMWhy is it the other Bitcoin cards https://btc-tc.com/ bringing like $8k for a series 1 sealed box and these not going to be the same.   This tread made me go on eBay and buy a sealed 12 back box.  I had to get in on the action. The collectable forum always cost me sats whenever I go on it to read up.  Lol  Bitcoin trading cards- theyll be going into series 3 next. Way less mintage but yes have been popular and secondary market has been big. I love that all there cards are btc themed. I dont like the quality as much and there set up isnt as good. Cardsmiths draws you in with the refractors, redemption, mr, CS, Holo. But im collecting both but way less btc trading cards. I think this year we might also see some cardsmiths scarce city auctions

comments.author: 5tift
comments.body: Is there an overview which redemption cards have already been found and how many are still open?An overview with the public keys would also be nice.And how long does the redemption program actually run.If I open one of my series 1 boxes in 10 years and there is a redemption card inside it would be nice if I could redeem it

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Quote from: 5tift on September 04, 2023, 07:04:07 AMIs there an overview which redemption cards have already been found and how many are still open?An overview with the public keys would also be nice.And how long does the redemption program actually run.If I open one of my series 1 boxes in 10 years and there is a redemption card inside it would be nice if I could redeem it  Out of the 5 or more 1 BTC redemption cards, I am aware of only 2 that have been found. I don't like the idea of saving unopened boxes for 10 years, what if you hit a 1 BTC redemption and BTC is worth $1 mil a coin, could Cardsmiths even afford to pay out if they haven't kept some BTC aside for redemption cards. Who knows if they will even still be in business then.Rip those packs

comments.author: 5tift
comments.body: That's why an official statement from Cardsmiths would be beneficial to ensure that after the sale of the series 1, redemption cards can be redeemed for x years.And an overview of the public key for all redemption cards.I like sealed boxes

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Just saw this on Reddit, some lucky guy just won 1 Bitcoin from cardsmiths. https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/169z0ur/so_i_won_a_btc/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: I have a sealed box (of 10 cards) that I was holding onto. Maybe you are right and I should just rip it open. The temptation is really great, lol.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: 5tift on September 04, 2023, 07:04:07 AMIs there an overview which redemption cards have already been found and how many are still open?An overview with the public keys would also be nice.And how long does the redemption program actually run.If I open one of my series 1 boxes in 10 years and there is a redemption card inside it would be nice if I could redeem it    They stated they would give plenty of notice before they ended any redemption program.  But like you said anything is possible. If they go out of business that could be bad if you were holding an card still. Although Id say your probably good for now. I think business is booming and its safe to keep your boxes for a year or two. I know of officially 3 BTCs that have been redeemedAlso not sure if you guys saw. The missing MR holofoils will appear in series 2 as gemstone refractors. Check twitter for official post

comments.author: 5tift
comments.body: Thank you Cryptogreatdane for the information and by the way good Youtube videos.I think I will also leave a few packs sealed and safely stowed.To these packs then come the same number of series 2 boxes, which I could also slowly pre-order
